snippet: The father of a man who died on a fishing boat still has unanswered questions about his son's death after speaking on the phone with an El Salvadoran castaway who apparently survived the 13-month accidental journey across the Pacific Ocean....

headline.print_headline: Father of Man Who Died at Sea Still Seeks Answers
headline.main: Father of Man Who Died at Sea Still Seeks Answers

lead_paragraph: The father of a man who died on a fishing boat still has unanswered questions about his son's death after speaking on the phone with an El Salvadoran castaway who apparently survived the 13-month accidental journey across the Pacific Ocean.
